Bill Gaskins (amụrụ n'ọnwa Mee 25, afọ 1953) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto na agụmakwụkwọ. Ọrụ ya na-enyocha njikọ nke ntutu isi ojii na nyocha nyocha nke ihe osise na narị afọ nke 21

N'akwụkwọ ya Isi ọma na Isi Ọjọọ: Foto, Gaskins na-ekwu maka ọrụ ntutu isi na nnọchiteanya na ọdịbendị ndị Afrịka Amerịka ma ọ na-enyocha ọrụ ntutu, ịchọ mma nke ihe ịchọ mma na njirimara onwe onye na ahụ.
Gaskins nwetara nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts na Tyler School of Art, Master of Arts Degree na Mahadum Ohio State, na Master of Fine Arts Degree site na Maryland Institute College of Art
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe n'afọ 2008 na McColl Center for Art + Innovation.

Bill Gaskins na-akụzi ugbu a na American Studies Program na Ngalaba nka na Mahadum Cornell. Ọ kụziri na Parsons the New School, na mmemme gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Media Studies na The New School for Public Engagement
Okwuchukwu ya na-elekwasị anya na nyocha nke agbụrụ na ihe ngosi nke foto ojii na ụmụ nwanyị ojii, ọ na-eduzi ọmụmụ ihe na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke foto.

Gaskins egosila foto ya gụnyere ihe ngosi otu na Jersey City Museum nke gụnyere ọrụ Renée Green, Chitra Ganesh, Simone Leigh na Sharon Louden, na ngosipụta nke obere ihe nkiri ya, The Meaning of Hope na Detroit Institute of Arts.

Usoro foto ya The Cadillac Chronicles na-egosi ndị isi ojii na Cadillacs ha. Ọ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ọdịnala Baltimore, Cadillac Parade, ma na-enyocha ihe nnọchianya nke Cadillac dị ka ihe nnọchi anya ike nwoke na ọnọdụ etiti.
Akwụkwọ ya Isi ọma na Isi Ọjọọ (afọ 1997) gosipụtara ụdị ntutu isi ndị Afrịka Amerịka, ma dabere na ngosi afọ 1996 na Robert B
